snippet: The bloc decided to widen sanctions on individuals in Ukraine while pushing for a diplomatic solution to Russia’s involvement there.
lead_paragraph: The bloc decided to widen sanctions on individuals in Ukraine while pushing for a diplomatic solution to Russia’s involvement there.

headline.main: E.U. to Toughen Sanctions on Ukrainian Separatists, but Not Russia
headline.print_headline: Push in U.N. To Intercept Jihadists’ Oil
